nodes.text: Quanya was a bubbly, rose-colored beverage served in fluted glasses. In 10 BBY, Ottilie, a server, offered quanya to guests aboard Dryden Vos' yacht, First Light. Han Solo and Qi'ra took two glasses of quanya from her tray and thanked her for them. Ottilie's tray of quanya was intended to serve Chrodber, the count of Serenno.

Quanya first appeared in canon in Solo: A Star Wars Story, a Star Wars anthology film released in 2018. It was identified by name in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, the accompanying visual dictionary book written by Pablo Hidalgo.
